data.name: Cistercian Abbeys
data.description:
Monasteries become self-sufficient, working their lands through Lay Brothers.
Villagers can drop off resources in Monasteries.
Prelates can be garrisoned in Monasteries to inspire all nearby Villagers, increasing their gather speed.

variations.name: Cistercian Abbeys
variations.description:
Monasteries become self-sufficient, working their lands through Lay Brothers.
Villagers can drop off resources in Monasteries.
Prelates can be garrisoned in Monasteries to inspire all nearby Villagers, increasing their gather speed.
variations.descriptionCN:
修道院可以自给自足，通过俗人兄弟耕种他们的土地。
村民可以将资源存放在修道院。
高级教士可以驻扎在修道院中，鼓舞附近的所有村民，提升他们的采集速度。

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.

variations.name: Professional Scouts
variations.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
variations.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。
